tip: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Let me be clear. You are entitled to nothing
Don't find fault, find a remedy; anybody can complain.
Tiger got to hunt, bird got to fly; Man got to sit and wonder 'why, why, why?' Tiger got to sleep, bird got to land; Man got to tell himself he understand.
Nothing that's worthwhile is ever easy.
To be a genius is to be misunderstood. But to be misunderstood is not to be a genius.
To understand the man you have to know what was happening in the world when he was twenty.
The magic you're looking for is in the work you're avoiding.
Once I slow down because I think I have reached my peak, then my skills will go nowhere but down.
As you think, so shall you become.
Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
